Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Damen. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train at Damen.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
